instructions_array: Preheat Oven to 350. Grease 9x13 inch pan.
In mixer bowl, beat cheese, butter, and sugar until fluffy. Add eggs, flour and vanilla. Beat well and set aside.
Prepare mix for bownies in a seporate bowl, as package directs
Spread half of cream cheese batter in prepared pan. Spoon half of borwnie mix on top, spreading evenly. Repeat.
For marbled effect, cut through batter in each quarter, drawing a circle with a spatula.
Bake 35 to 45 minutes or until done.
